record.author: Ferrell (1969)
record.notes: Ferrell, R.(1969). Taiwan Aboriginal Groups: Problems in cultural and linguistic classification. Monograph 17: Institute of Ethnology, Academica Sinica
record.problems:
Some slightly different cognacy - see annotations column.
Andreea: replaced /đ/ with /ð/ (cf. book).

record.annotation: [q] is unexpected w/ [k] in Pilam & Katipul. -EG
Source ACD: Sprout or grow naturally
Note: Intransitive not Transitive.; Orig. marked as set 23, but Puyuma [v] should correspond to Itbayat [v] not [b]. -EG
